snippet: Guard Jamal Crawford of the Los Angeles Clippers was named the winner of the N.B.A.’s Sixth Man award, becoming the oldest recipient and the first to win the award with different teams.
abstract: Los Angeles Clippers guard Jamal Crawford is named winner of NBA's Sixth Man award, becoming oldest recipient and first to win the award with different teams; was also honored as the league's best player off the bench while with the Atlanta Hawks in 2009-2010; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: Guard Jamal Crawford of the Los Angeles Clippers was named the winner of the N.B.A.’s Sixth Man award, becoming the oldest recipient and the first to win the award with different teams.

headline.main: Crawford Named Top Sixth Man for Second Time
headline.print_headline: Second Time for Top Sixth Man
